name: 林百福
objective:
柴油引擎共軌噴射的時代已來臨，讓學生充分了解共軌噴射柴油引擎的原理及作動外，最重要的也是讓學生要有現場操作的實務檢修體驗，我們安排6次的實務教學，讓學生畢業後具業界要求的技術水準。

The era of diesel engine common rail injection has arrived, allowing students to fully understand the principle and operation of the common rail injection diesel engine. The most important thing is to let students have a practical experience of on-site operation. We arrange 6 practical teachings for students. After graduation, it has the technical level required by the industry.
